TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BackgroundWorker extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BackgroundWorker extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 在单独的线程上执行操作。

span.span: Executes an operation on a separate thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许您在单独的专用线程上运行操作。The class allows you to run an operation on a separate, dedicated thread. 耗时的操作（如下载和数据库事务）可能导致用户界面（UI）看起来好像在运行时已停止响应。Time-consuming operations like downloads and database transactions can cause your user interface (UI) to seem as though it has stopped responding while they are running. 如果需要响应式 UI，并面临与此类操作相关联的长时间延迟， 类可提供一种方便的解决方案。When you want a responsive UI and you are faced with long delays associated with such operations, the class provides a convenient solution. 若要在后台执行耗时的操作，请创建 ，并在操作完成时侦听报告操作进度和信号的事件。To execute a time-consuming operation in the background, create a and listen for events that report the progress of your operation and signal when your operation is finished. 可以通过编程方式创建 ，也可以从 "**工具箱**" 的 "**组件**" 选项卡将其拖到窗体上。You can create the programmatically or you can drag it onto your form from the **Components** tab of the **Toolbox**. 如果在 Windows 窗体设计器中创建 ，它将显示在组件栏中，并且它的属性将显示在 "属性窗口中。If you create the in the Windows Forms Designer, it will appear in the Component Tray, and its properties will be displayed in the Properties window. 若要设置后台操作，请为 事件添加事件处理程序。To set up for a background operation, add an event handler for the event. 在此事件处理程序中调用耗时的操作。Call your time-consuming operation in this event handler. 若要开始操作，请调用 。To start the operation, call . 若要接收有关进度更新的通知，请处理 事件。To receive notifications of progress updates, handle the event. 若要在操作完成时接收通知，请处理 事件。To receive a notification when the operation is completed, handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 您必须注意不要处理 事件处理程序中的任何用户界面对象。You must be careful not to manipulate any user-interface objects in your event handler. 而是通过 和 事件与用户界面通信。Instead, communicate to the user interface through the and events. > > 事件不会跨 边界进行封送处理。 events are not marshaled across boundaries. 不要使用 组件来执行多个 中的多线程操作。Do not use a component to perform multithreaded operations in more than one . 如果后台操作需要参数，请使用参数调用 。If your background operation requires a parameter, call with your parameter. 在 事件处理程序中，可以从 属性中提取参数。Inside the event handler, you can extract the parameter from the property. 若要详细了解 ，请参阅[如何：在后台运行操作](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background)。For more information about , see [How to: Run an Operation in the Background](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 类的基本知识，以便以异步方式执行耗时的操作。The following code example demonstrates the basics of the class for executing a time-consuming operation asynchronously. 下图显示了输出的示例。The following illustration shows an example of the output. ![BackgroundWorker 简单示例](~/add/media/backgroundworker-simple.png "BackgroundWorker 简单示例")![BackgroundWorker simple example](~/add/media/backgroundworker-simple.png "BackgroundWorker simple example") 若要尝试此代码，请创建 Windows 窗体应用程序。To try this code, create a Windows Forms application. 添加一个名为 `resultLabel` 的 控件，并添加两个名为 `startAsyncButton` 和 `cancelAsyncButton`的 控件。Add a control named `resultLabel` and add two controls named `startAsyncButton` and `cancelAsyncButton`. 为这两个按钮创建 事件处理程序。Create event handlers for both buttons. 从 "工具箱" 的 "**组件**" 选项卡中，添加一个名为 `backgroundWorker1`的 组件。From the **Components** tab of the Toolbox, add a component named `backgroundWorker1`. 为 创建 、和 事件处理程序。Create , , and event handlers for the . 在窗体的代码中，将现有代码替换为以下代码。In the code for the form, replace the existing code with the following code. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorkerSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.componentmodel.backgroundworkersimple/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorkerSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.componentmodel.backgroundworkersimple/vb/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类异步执行耗时的操作。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class for executing a time-consuming operation asynchronously. 下图显示了输出的示例。The following illustration shows an example of the output. ![BackgroundWorker 斐波那契示例](~/add/media/backgroundworker-fibonacci.png "BackgroundWorker Fibonacci 示例")![BackgroundWorker Fibonacci example](~/add/media/backgroundworker-fibonacci.png "BackgroundWorker Fibonacci example") 操作计算选定的斐波那契数，在计算过程中报告进度更新，并允许取消挂起的计算。The operation computes the selected Fibonacci number, reports progress updates as the calculation proceeds, and permits a pending calculation to be canceled. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 请求取消挂起的后台操作。

span.span: Requests cancellation of a pending background operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提交终止挂起后台操作的请求，并将 属性设置为 "`true`"。 submits a request to terminate the pending background operation and sets the property to `true`. 调用 时，你的辅助方法有机会停止其执行并退出。When you call , your worker method has an opportunity to stop its execution and exit. 辅助代码应定期检查 属性，以确定是否已将其设置为 `true`。The worker code should periodically check the property to see if it has been set to `true`. > [!CAUTION] > 请注意， 事件处理程序中的代码可能会在发出取消请求时完成其工作，并且轮询循环可能会遗漏 设置为 `true`。Be aware that your code in the event handler may finish its work as a cancellation request is being made, and your polling loop may miss being set to `true`. 在这种情况下，即使发出了取消请求， 事件处理程序中 的 标志也不会设置为 `true`。In this case, the flag of in your event handler will not be set to `true`, even though a cancellation request was made. 这种情况称为*争用条件*，是多线程编程中常见的问题。This situation is called a *race condition* and is a common concern in multithreaded programming. 有关多线程设计问题的详细信息，请参阅[托管线程处理最佳做法](/dotnet/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices)。For more information about multithreading design issues, see [Managed Threading Best Practices](/dotnet/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法取消异步（"后台"）操作。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to cancel an asynchronous ("background") operation. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示应用程序是否已请求取消后台操作。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the application has requested cancellation of a background operation.

value.span: 如果应用程序已请求取消后台操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application has requested cancellation of a background operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true`，则在 上调用了 方法。If is `true`, then the method has been called on the . 此属性旨在供工作线程使用，此属性应定期检查 并在其设置为 `true`时中止后台操作。This property is meant for use by the worker thread, which should periodically check and abort the background operation when it is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性查询有关其取消状态的 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to query a about its cancellation state. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#8)]

span.span: Occurs when is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法时，将引发此事件。This event is raised when you call the method. 在这种情况下，你可以在其中开始执行可能耗费时间的工作的操作。This is where you start the operation that performs the potentially time-consuming work. 事件处理程序中的代码应定期检查 属性值，如果 `true`，则中止操作。Your code in the event handler should periodically check the property value and abort the operation if it is `true`. 出现这种情况时，你可以将 的 标志设置为 `true`，并且 事件处理程序中 的 标志将设置为 `true`。When this occurs, you can set the flag of to `true`, and the flag of in your event handler will be set to `true`. > [!CAUTION] > 请注意， 事件处理程序中的代码可能会在发出取消请求时完成其工作，并且轮询循环可能会遗漏 设置为 `true`。Be aware that your code in the event handler may finish its work as a cancellation request is being made, and your polling loop may miss being set to `true`. 在这种情况下，即使发出了取消请求， 事件处理程序中 的 标志也不会设置为 `true`。In this case, the flag of in your event handler will not be set to `true`, even though a cancellation request was made. 这种情况称为*争用条件*，是多线程编程中常见的问题。This situation is called a *race condition* and is a common concern in multithreaded programming. 有关多线程设计问题的详细信息，请参阅[托管线程处理最佳做法](/dotnet/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices)。For more information about multithreading design issues, see [Managed Threading Best Practices](/dotnet/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices). 如果操作生成结果，则可以将结果分配给 属性。If your operation produces a result, you can assign the result to the property. 这将可用于 属性中的 事件处理程序。This will be available to the event handler in the property. 如果操作引发了你的代码未处理的异常，则 将捕获异常并将其传递到 事件处理程序，在该处理程序中，它作为 的 属性公开。If the operation raises an exception that your code does not handle, the catches the exception and passes it into the event handler, where it is exposed as the property of . 如果你在 Visual Studio 调试器下运行，调试器将在引发未处理的异常的 事件处理程序中的点中断。If you are running under the Visual Studio debugger, the debugger will break at the point in the event handler where the unhandled exception was raised. 如果有多个 ，则不应直接引用其中的任何一个，因为这会将 事件处理程序放到 的特定实例上。If you have more than one , you should not reference any of them directly, as this would couple your event handler to a specific instance of . 相反，应通过在 事件处理程序中转换 `sender` 参数来访问 。Instead, you should access your by casting the `sender` parameter in your event handler. 您必须注意不要处理 事件处理程序中的任何用户界面对象。You must be careful not to manipulate any user-interface objects in your event handler. 而是通过 事件与用户界面通信。Instead, communicate to the user interface through the events. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件来启动异步操作。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event to start an asynchronous operation. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法报告异步操作的进度。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to report the progress of an asynchronous operation. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#24)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#24)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReportProgress(int32 percentProgress) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: percentProgress
param.span: 已完成的后台操作所占的百分比，范围从 0% 到 100%。

span.span: The percentage, from 0 to 100, of the background operation that is complete.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要后台操作来报告其进度，可以调用 方法来引发 事件。If you need the background operation to report on its progress, you can call the method to raise the event. 属性值必须是 `true`，否则 将引发 。The property value must be `true`, or will throw an . 您可以通过实现一种有意义的方式来测量您的后台操作的进度，这是整个任务完成的百分比。It is up to you to implement a meaningful way of measuring your background operation's progress as a percentage of the total task completed. 对 方法的调用是异步的，并且会立即返回。The call to the method is asynchronous and returns immediately. 事件处理程序在创建 的线程上执行。The event handler executes on the thread that created the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法向用户报告异步操作的进度。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to report the progress of an asynchronous operation to the user. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要后台操作来报告其进度，可以调用 方法来引发 事件。If you need the background operation to report on its progress, you can call the method to raise the event. 属性值必须 `true`或 将引发 。The property value must `true`, or will throw an . 您可以通过实现一种有意义的方式来测量您的后台操作的进度，这是整个任务完成的百分比。It is up to you to implement a meaningful way of measuring your background operation's progress as a percentage of the total task completed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法向用户报告异步操作的进度。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to report the progress of an asynchronous operation to the user. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RunWorkerAsync() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Starts execution of a background operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提交请求以异步运行操作。The method submits a request to start the operation running asynchronously. 处理请求时，会引发 事件，后者又开始执行后台操作。When the request is serviced, the event is raised, which in turn starts execution of your background operation. 如果后台操作已在运行，则再次调用 将引发 。If the background operation is already running, calling again will raise an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来启动异步操作。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to start an asynchronous operation. 它是[如何：在后台下载文件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-download-a-file-in-the-background)的更大示例的一部分。It is part of a larger example described in [How to: Download a File in the Background](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-download-a-file-in-the-background). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker.IsBusy/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RunWorkerAsync(object argument) cil managed

param.name: argument
param.span: 要在 事件处理程序中执行的后台操作使用的参数。

span.span: A parameter for use by the background operation to be executed in the event handler.
Starts execution of a background operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提交请求以异步运行操作。The method submits a request to start the operation running asynchronously. 处理请求时，会引发 事件，后者又开始执行后台操作。When the request is serviced, the event is raised, which in turn starts execution of your background operation. 如果操作需要参数，则可以将其作为 `argument` 参数提供给 。If your operation requires a parameter, you can provide it as the `argument` parameter to . 如果后台操作已在运行，则再次调用 将引发 。If the background operation is already running, calling again will raise an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来启动异步操作。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to start an asynchronous operation. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#3)]

span.span: Managed Threading Best Practices

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RunWorkerCompleted As RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 当后台操作已完成、被取消或引发异常时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the background operation has completed, has been canceled, or has raised an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 事件处理程序返回时，将引发此事件。This event is raised when the event handler returns. 如果操作成功完成，并且在 事件处理程序中指定其结果，则可以通过 属性访问结果。If the operation completes successfully and its result is assigned in the event handler, you can access the result through the property. 的 属性指示操作引发了异常。The property of indicates that an exception was thrown by the operation. 的 属性指示后台操作是否处理了取消请求。The property of indicates whether a cancellation request was processed by the background operation. 如果 事件处理程序中的代码通过检查 标志并将 的 标志设置为 `true`来检测取消请求，则 的 标志也将设置为 `true`。If your code in the event handler detects a cancellation request by checking the flag and setting the flag of to `true`, the flag of also will be set to `true`. > [!CAUTION] > 请注意， 事件处理程序中的代码可能会在发出取消请求时完成其工作，并且轮询循环可能会遗漏 设置为 `true`。Be aware that your code in the event handler may finish its work as a cancellation request is being made, and your polling loop may miss being set to `true`. 在这种情况下，即使发出了取消请求， 事件处理程序中 的 标志也不会设置为 `true`。In this case, the flag of in your event handler will not be set to `true`, even though a cancellation request was made. 这种情况称为*争用条件*，是多线程编程中常见的问题。This situation is called a *race condition* and is a common concern in multithreaded programming. 有关多线程设计问题的详细信息，请参阅[托管线程处理最佳做法](/dotnet/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices)。For more information about multithreading design issues, see [Managed Threading Best Practices](/dotnet/standard/threading/managed-threading-best-practices). 在访问 属性之前， 事件处理程序应始终检查 和 属性。Your event handler should always check the and properties before accessing the property. 如果引发了异常，或者如果操作已取消，则访问 属性会引发异常。If an exception was raised or if the operation was canceled, accessing the property raises an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件来处理异步操作的结果。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event to handle the result of an asynchronous operation. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望 支持进度更新，请将 属性设置为 `true`。Set the property to `true` if you want the to support progress updates. 如果 `true`此属性，则用户代码可以调用 方法来引发 事件。When this property is `true`, user code can call the method to raise the event.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the supports asynchronous cancellation.

value.span: 如果 支持取消，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the supports cancellation; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望 支持取消，请将 属性设置为 `true`。Set the property to `true` if you want the to support cancellation. `true`此属性时，可以调用 方法来中断后台操作。When this property is `true`, you can call the method to interrupt a background operation.
